original_text: while I was speaking in prayer, the man Gabriel, whom I had seen in the vision at the first, came to me in swift flight at the time of the evening sacrifice.
korean_text: 곧 내가 기도할 때에 이전에 환상 중에 본 그 사람 가브리엘이 빨리 날아서 저녁 제사를 드릴 때 즈음에 내게 이르더니

sentences.original_text: while I was speaking in prayer
whom I had seen in the vision at the first
came to me in swift flight
at the time of the evening sacrifice.
